Products.title: Products
Products.description: Here you can see the products added to the shop.
Products.productFetchFailed: Failed to fetch product. Please contact an administrator.
Products.productDeletionFailed: Failed to delete the product. Please contact an administrator.
Products.noProducts: There is no product in the shop.
Products.unauthorized: You must be logged in to perform this action.

ProductForm.addProductDescription: Here your can add a new product to your shop!
ProductForm.nameMaxLength: The product name must be less than 32 characters.
ProductForm.descriptionMaxLength: The product description must be less than 256 characters.
ProductForm.priceMinValue: The product price must be greater than 0.
ProductForm.productCreationFailed: Internal error, please contact the administrator.
ProductForm.unicityConstraintViolation: A product with the same reference already exists.
ProductForm.editProductDescription: Here you can edit a product of the shop.
ProductForm.unauthorized: You must be logged in to perform this action.

AddProductSuccess.title: Success!
AddProductSuccess.description: You successfully added a new product to the shop!

ProductCard.deletionModalDescription: Are you sure that you want to delete this product?

NotFound.title: Something's missing.
NotFound.description: Sorry, we can't find that page. You'll find lots to explore on the home page.

Metadata.title: Next.js Starter
Metadata.description: A starter template to build a Next.js app with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Zustand.
